name: Cobalt-B

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A range DPS that focuses on dodge attacking. She really comes to life with her 6th advancement, significantly lowering the cooldown of her very powerful skill with every dodge attack. Change to 4-set Samir or 2-set Samit and 2-set Crow.

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description:
On the ground, tap normal attack button to launch 5 attacks in a row.

  • First Attack: Deal a total damage equal to 52.3% of ATK + 3.
  • Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to 75.6% of ATK + 4.
  • Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to 94.5% of ATK +5.
  • Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to 142.8% of ATK + 8.
  • Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to 137.8% of ATK + 7.

skills.name: Charged Shot
skills.description: Hold attack button to charge the attack, then release to fire rounds dealing 95.4% of ATK + 5 damage, plus explosion three seconds later (or if the target dies), dealing 23.9% of ATK to nearby enemies, with AOE doubling each time (up to 4 times) a target in the area is dealt damage, plus increased damage.

skills.name: Jumping Blast
skills.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use an aerial attack to trigger Jumping Blast.

Toss a bomb that deals damage equal to 90.8% of ATK + 5 to enemies in a circle ahead, knocking them back a certain distance and consume 250 endurance.

skills.name: Aerial Discharge
skills.description:
Launch Jumping Blast after double jumping.

Fire an Omnium beam downward. The beam then sweeps forward, dealing damage equal to 33.8% of ATK + 2.

skills.name: Heavy Bombardment
skills.description: Hold attack button during a normal attack to unleash Suppressing Fire in front, and deal enemies 102% of ATK + 5 AOE damage.

skills.name: Close Quarters
skills.description:
Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Close Quarters.

Deal damage equal to 156.1% of ATK + 8 to targets in a frontal cone area.

skills.name: Barrage
skills.description:
Constant fire in a forward cone area to deal 666% of ATK + 35 damage.

Cooldown: 60 seconds.

skills.name: Explosive Rain
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon removes all debuffs from the wielder, and unleashes 3 grenades forward, dealing 570% of ATK + 30 AOE damage in all and causing launch.

weapon_type.name: Flame
weapon_type.description: Fully charged weapons will set the target on fire for 8 seconds with the next attack, causing ongoing damage of 58% of ATK every second. Ignited targets receive 50% efficacy from healing.

weapon_resonance.name: Flame Resonance
weapon_resonance.description: Increase flame ATK by 15% and flame resistance by 25%. Active by equipping 2 or more flame weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Effect cannot be stacked.

advancement: Each round of attacks deals additional damage equal to 2% of the target's current HP (cannot exceed 200% of ATK).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Heavy Bombardment, Dodge Attack, and Close Quarters inflict Ion Scorch on targets that are already burned, dealing flame damage equal to 60% of their current ATK every second for 10 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.
The damage from Ion Scorch increases to 90% of ATK. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skills will refresh the duration of Ion Scorch.

Barrage inflicts burn for 15 seconds. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skills reduce the cooldown of Barrage by 4 seconds.

This effect has a 1.5 second cooldown.

traits.name: Lingering Warmth
traits.description: Upon using a discharge skill, Cobalt-B restores a random amount of weapon charge between 50 and 120 points.

traits.name: Sparks
traits.description: Upon using a discharge skill, Cobalt-B restores a random amount of weapon charge between 90 and 180 points.
